name: Air Brawl
description: A fast paced multiplayer dogfighting game that focuses on creative weapons and game mechanics that reward skillful flying.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews.review_text: Doing air tricks and speed runs through holes, shooting down 7 enemies in a row, then accidentally crashing into a lampost and blowing up. :/ Very fun game though.  EDIT: I did multiplayer and it is one of the funnest games I have ever played.

My verdict:  PROS:    Runs great on almost any computer, includes wide variety of graphical settings.    Great, tight controls.    Great soundtrack and sounds.    Wide variety of classes.    Almost never hard to find a game.    Has potential to turn into a competitive dogfighting game.   CONS:    A few bugs.    Hard to change controls.    Not full controller support.    Short, complicated tutorial.

In short if you're looking for a game like Crimson Skies, look elsewhere the controls are no good, and the game was last updated in November of 2015. If you need to know more, then read on. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- So I don't know how to review this game. If you go to the game's Reddit or see reviews, you see people who love the game and like it. However I don't see it, and the lack of updates since November 2015 feels wrong to me.   The game is OK. It works, and it has more than a few features. My biggest problem is the controls. The planes have no weight to them and that just wrong. No matter what other good Dogfighting game you look at you will find that the planes have weight to them. Crimson Skies had weight in their aircraft, and Rouge Squadron had weight on its ships. No matter what the biggest problem with the game is the bad controls. The lack of weight not only feels wrong, but you also don't get a good sense of where the ground is and where the sky is.   And the fact the developers say the game's finished, and they haven't updated it since November of 2015, is just wrong. The game needs a few refinements here and there. And they could add so much more to it. This is only the base of what could be a good game, and it's not a good game right now.

This is a good game. It is hard to master thats for sure but for me, It was easy to get into I mean I only played for a little bit so take my opinion with a grain of salt but hey. I think its good, and arent I a trustworthy person?
high speed, tight controls, and creative weaponry make for a frantic, fast paced multiplayer dogfighting game. Playing with friends is highly recommended.
It's so cool!!

I really like it, I love when dogfight are fast and control are solid. Expect to die a lot of time and 3/4 of time have a negative ratio. the plane are all different and play differently same for the weapon. I would rate this game 9/10 (also the gamemode are repetive plz do work on this thanks) but really just play it its a lot of fun if you dont like the game simply eat a banana muffin its good too
freakin planes with guns shooting other planes with guns. highly recommend.
Very skill based game when it comes to manuvering your plane, making it so that every kill fells rewarding
Cancels development a month or two after release. ♥♥♥♥ Landfall Games. ♥♥♥♥ supporting their Air Brawl 2...

The game has decent graphics and everything works well enough, it's just that not many people play, and some people that play all the time are experts and wipe out servers of noobs. Unless you can get really good at this game really quickly, don't bother.
there's a reason it's free
I want the soundtrack to consist only of the song dangerzone by kenny loggins

I enjoyed this game just because it's the only dogfighting game that I can actually control the plane in with constantly colliding with ♥♥♥♥, it's great. I also love it for it plentiful content but trailer up above mentions that already so no sence in me reiterating it. The only weakness that I can pick out is the fact that it has no player base so most of the time you're left to verse bots which are inhumanly difficult. I'm talking making nearly every shot with a machine gun difficult. The should also be a bit more options when hosting a server, such as an option to turn those bots off or change their difficulty and definitely the option to set a level cap for your server because I had a level 37 enter onto my server of level 1-5's and he was continually reking us. Overall though a pretty good game that I recommend you buy especially if you have real life friends you can play with.
Could I get my £8 back please? God damn.

i love the design and everything the only thing i think might work for me is some kinda singleplayer(as in a campaign type of mode) mode if possible this game is best i really love the design tho great work
Steap learning curve, couldn't really get into it. Graphics are great, and a cool concept too.  5/10

Well you know when I first played this pile of crap I thought to myslef, This feels like a free to play. Oh well look at that, I spent ten dollars on this ♥♥♥♥. Now you can get it for free. Servers are completly dead.
This game is ♥♥♥♥, it looks good but its not, don't buy this game, it will make me very sad.
lower the damb bot dificulty you can never get a kill in offline mode

This game has a lot of potential but its really buggy, the controls are very wierd and sometimes dont even work also the joystick controls dont work. I really want to like this game but I cant but hopefully they update the game and fix some errors.
bad, controls aren't tight, hardly any players except die-hard try-hards and gmae modes are repetative

DIE this game still sucks, I downloaded it twice and its still terrible, the controls are NOT tight, the tutorioal dosent which button IS THE GOD DAMN ALT-FIRE, when I search servers it says that there are no servers, and sometimes in the city level my plane stops moving and goes in the ground and sometimes on all levels I burn on fire, fix this excuse for a good game.
i dont get the fun of this game. crashing all the f... time, everyone
Very, Very, Very fun. Definitley a skill gap. but its an aboslutely great idea and has some amazing potential.

They finally did it, they finally made a game where u can swat someone with a hammer....IN A DOGFIGHT. This game is really really fun, just moving around feels entertaining if you've ever been fond of aerial combat games. Never a dull moment in air brawl, and on behalf of all dogfighters out there, I say thank you for adding a little more spice to dogfighting; i.e the capacity to bash your enemies in mid air with giant warhammers attached to your jet fighter.
I paid money for this before, But it was worth it.  I was in a money situation with low pay results, And i still got it.  10/10 Would support a really good devteam and have to eat scraps again.
Great Controls, nice weapon variaty. Maybe some balancing issues but fun overall
Extremely fun, but often unpopulated.
this game is great , go play it with your friends , i can't recommend it enough
Cool game but not too many players :(
Good game, really fun to fly the planes and play with friends. :D Graphics are also pretty good. Very Recommended!!!
cool but i had to uninstall because the controls almost made me kill my self

This game certainly had potential, but is now no more than dead. It is now free though, which is more of an insult to the people who did buy it than actually helpful, because less people are playing it than ever.
this game is nice and i sugest you should get it if you like planes and guns, or obstacle corses and other game modes!
This game is so fun!

This is one of the best games I have ever played. The controls are tight, the game runs smooth, and the game doesn't give you any chance to blame itself for your terrible flying.   And because it is now free, no one has an excuse not to try it. My only complaint is the lack of players, but this is easily solved with a few friends.
I love flying through the air! its so fun but it can be hard!
I recomend this game. It's free and you can customise your plane to whatever your play style guides you to play.
i didnt like it. Way too hard yto control and SO MANY SERVER ISSUES
